hero.title: AI Video Generation with Native Audio Sync
hero.description:
Seedance 2.0 is ByteDance's next-generation AI video model.
Generate cinematic 2K videos with perfectly synchronized audio, lip-sync, and multi-shot narratives.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Seedance 2.0
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Seedance 2.0 is the world's first AI video model with native audio-video synchronization. Generate studio-quality videos with perfectly timed sound effects, dialogue, and music.

items.title: Native Audio-Video Sync
items.description: Unlike post-processing approaches, Seedance 2.0 generates audio and video simultaneously through Dual-Branch Diffusion Transformer architecture.

items.title: Phoneme-Level Lip Sync
items.description: Achieve perfect lip synchronization across 8+ languages including English, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and Spanish.

items.title: Cinematic Quality
items.description: Generate 2K resolution videos with professional-grade visual effects and seamless transitions.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Seedance 2.0
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: The most advanced AI video generation technology, delivering unmatched quality and performance.

items.title: Perfect Lip Synchronization
items.description: Revolutionary phoneme-level lip sync technology ensures characters speak naturally in any language. No more uncanny valley - just realistic, expressive digital humans.

items.title: Multi-Shot Narratives
items.description: Create complex, cinematic sequences from a single prompt. Seedance 2.0 understands story structure and generates coherent multi-scene videos with consistent characters and settings.

items.title: 30% Faster Generation
items.description: Optimized architecture delivers studio-quality results faster than any competitor. Generate more content in less time without compromising on quality.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use Seedance 2.0
usage.description: Create stunning AI videos in four simple steps:

items.title: Write Your Prompt
items.description: Describe your video scene, characters, actions, and desired audio. Be specific about mood, setting, and dialogue.

items.title: Choose Language & Style
items.description: Select from 8+ languages for dialogue and lip-sync. Pick your visual style - cinematic, anime, realistic, or artistic.

items.title: Generate Video
items.description: Seedance 2.0 processes your prompt and generates synchronized audio and video using Dual-Branch DiT technology.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Export your 2K resolution video with native audio. Ready for social media, presentations, or professional production.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of Seedance 2.0
feature.description: Cutting-edge technology that sets a new standard for AI video generation.

items.title: Native Audio Generation
items.description: Synchronized sound effects, music, and dialogue generated alongside video - not added in post-processing.

items.title: 8+ Language Support
items.description: Perfect lip synchronization in Chinese, English, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, and more languages.

items.title: 2K Resolution Output
items.description: Cinema-quality 2K resolution video output suitable for professional production and distribution.

items.title: Multi-Shot Storytelling
items.description: Generate coherent multi-scene narratives with consistent characters and seamless transitions.

items.title: Dual-Branch DiT Architecture
items.description: Revolutionary Diffusion Transformer with separate audio and video branches for perfect synchronization.

items.title: 30% Faster Than Competitors
items.description: Optimized generation pipeline delivers results faster without compromising quality.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us at support@seedance2.site

items.title: What makes Seedance 2.0 different from other AI video generators?
items.description: Seedance 2.0 is the first AI video model with native audio-video synchronization. Unlike tools that generate video first and add audio later, Seedance 2.0 uses a Dual-Branch Diffusion Transformer to create perfectly synchronized audio and video simultaneously. This results in natural lip-sync, properly timed sound effects, and coherent audio-visual narratives.

items.title: Which languages are supported for lip synchronization?
items.description: Seedance 2.0 supports phoneme-level lip synchronization in 8+ languages: English, Chinese (Mandarin), Korean, Japanese, Spanish, French, German, and Portuguese. More languages are being added regularly. Each language has been specifically trained for accurate mouth movements and natural speech patterns.

items.title: What resolution and quality can I expect?
items.description: Seedance 2.0 generates videos in up to 2K resolution (2560x1440) with cinema-quality visual effects. The Pro plan will soon support 4K output. All videos feature smooth 30fps playback with high bitrate encoding suitable for professional distribution.

items.title: How does multi-shot narrative generation work?
items.description: With multi-shot generation, you can describe a complete scene sequence in a single prompt, and Seedance 2.0 will generate multiple coherent shots with consistent characters, settings, and story flow. For example, you can describe a conversation with reaction shots, and the AI will create a properly edited sequence.

items.title: Can I use generated videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! All paid plans (Basic, Plus, Pro) include full commercial rights to generated content. Free plan videos include a watermark and are for personal/non-commercial use only. We recommend reviewing our Terms of Service for specific usage guidelines.

items.title: How does Seedance 2.0 compare to Sora, Runway, and Veo 3?
items.description: Seedance 2.0 ranks #1 on the Artificial Analysis benchmark, outperforming Sora, Runway Gen-3, Veo 3, and Kling in overall video quality. Key advantages include native audio-video sync (no post-processing needed), superior lip-sync accuracy, multi-shot storytelling, and 30% faster generation speed. See our detailed comparison page for benchmarks.

items.title: What's the Dual-Branch Diffusion Transformer architecture?
items.description: The Dual-Branch DiT is Seedance 2.0's core innovation. It uses two parallel transformer branches - one for video generation and one for audio - that share information at each denoising step. This allows the model to generate perfectly synchronized audio and video rather than treating them as separate outputs.

items.title: Is there an API available for developers?
items.description: Yes, API access is available starting with the Plus plan. The Seedance 2.0 API allows you to integrate video generation into your applications, with support for text-to-video, image-to-video, and video-to-video transformations. Full API documentation is available at docs.seedance2.site.
